All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
AboutController
JavaFX controller for the "About" dialog.
AbstractInputPopup
Abstract base class for input dialogs in the paint program.
AnchorTypes
Enum of anchor positions used for positioning subwindows relative to the main application window.
AutosaveBrew
Manages automatic workspace saving at fixed intervals and posts events.
AutosaveTimeChangedEvent
Event indicating the autosave timer has changed.
BottomInfoController
Controller for the bottom information panel of the workspace UI.
BrushTool
A simple freehand paintbrush tool that draws continuous strokes following the mouse cursor, using the currently selected color and width.
ChangelogController
JavaFX controller for the "Changelog" dialog.
ChangeThemeRequest
Event requesting a theme change.
ClearWorkspacePopup
Popup window that confirms clearing the current workspace.
ClearWorkspaceRequest
Requests that the current workspace be cleared.
CloseCurrentWorkspaceRequest
Requests to close the currently active workspace.
CloseProgramRequest
Requests to gracefully close the program.
ColorCapability
Marker interface indicating that a tool supports adjustable drawing color.
ColorChangedEvent
Event indicating the global color has changed.
CommitSelectionRequest
Requests to commit the current selection.
CopySelectionRequest
Requests to copy the current selection.
DropperTool
A tool for selecting colors from the canvas.
EraserTool
A tool for erasing pixels from the canvas.
EventBus
A simple event bus for program-wide reactive programming tasks.
EventBusPublisher
Convenience base class providing access to the global EventBus.
EventBusSubscriber
Declares that a class contains event listener methods for the global event bus.
FileIOBrew
Publishes file I/O-related actions to the application's EventBus.
FileOpenedEvent
Event signaling that a file has been opened for editing or display.
FileOpenRequest
Requests that a file be opened.
FocusWorkspaceRequest
Requests focus for the specified workspace.
ForceCloseProgramRequest
Forces the program to close immediately.
GetDirtyWorkspacesRequest
Requests a list of unsaved (dirty) workspaces.
GotDirtyWorkspacesEvent
Event containing the list of unsaved (dirty) workspaces.
HelpController
JavaFX controller for the "Help" dialog.
InitSubWindowServiceRequest
Initializes the subwindow service with top bar buttons.
InitWorkspaceBrewRequest
Initializes the workspace manager with the main tab pane.
KeystrokeBrew
Maps global keyboard shortcuts to application events.
LeftTopbarController
Controller for the left top bar, which contains the File/Edit/View/Image menus.
LineTool
A tool for drawing straight lines between two points.
LineUtil
Provides low-level line and stroke rendering helpers.
LoggerBrew
Background file logger that asynchronously writes timestamped application events to a session log file.
MainController
The root JavaFX controller for the application.
MoveSelectionRequest
Requests to move the current selection by the given offset.
MoveTool
Tool for moving a selection on the canvas.
NewWorkspacePopup
Popup dialog for creating a new workspace/canvas.
NewWorkspaceRequest
Event signaling that the user has requested creation of a new workspace.
OpenAboutRequest
Requests to open the About window.
OpenChangelogRequest
Requests to open the changelog window.
OpenGitHubRequest
Requests to open the project’s GitHub page.
OpenHelpRequest
Requests to open the project’s Help window.
OpenSettingsRequest
Requests to open the project’s Settings window.
OpenToolsRequest
Requests to open the Tools subwindow.
PaintLauncher
The main launcher for the Paint(t) application.
PaintTools
Utility class providing access to all built-in paint tools.
PanTool
A simple pan tool used for moving the canvas view.
PasteSelectionRequest
Requests to paste the current selection at its location.
ProgramBrew
Manages the program lifecycle and handles application-level events.
ProgramSaveWarningPopup
Popup warning the user about unsaved changes in multiple workspaces before closing the program.
RedoRequest
Requests to redo the last undone action.
ResizeWorkspaceRequest
Requests to resize the current workspace.
RightTopbarController
Controller for the right-side top bar, managing button actions and subwindow requests.
RotateSelectionRequest
Requests to rotate the current selection.
SaveStateRequest
Requests to save the current workspace state.
SelectionCapability
Handles selection, movement, rotation, copy/paste, and previewing of a rectangular portion of a workspace canvas.
SelectionPastedEvent
Event fired when a selection is pasted.
SelectionRequest
Fired when a new selection is made.
SelectionTool
Tool for selecting a rectangular area on the canvas.
SetAutosaveIntervalRequest
Sets the autosave interval.
SettingsController
Controller for the application settings panel.
ShapeChangedEvent
Event indicating the active shape configuration has changed.
ShapeConfig
Immutable record defining basic shape drawing configuration.
ShapesTool
Tool for drawing shapes on the canvas.
ShapeType
Defines all supported geometric shape types for drawing tools.
ShapeUtil
Utility methods for creating and rendering common geometric shapes.
ShortcutBarController
Controller for the shortcut bar.
ShowClearWorkspacePopupRequest
Requests to show the clear workspace confirmation popup.
ShowNewWorkspacePopupRequest
Requests to show the new workspace creation popup.
ShowProgramSaveWarningPopupRequest
Requests to show the program save warning popup.
ShowWorkspaceSaveWarningPopupRequest
Requests to show the workspace save warning popup.
SimpleWebServer
Minimal local HTTP server that exposes workspaces as PNG images.
SimpleWebServer.IndexHandler
Simple handler serving HTML with workspace links.
SimpleWebServer.WorkspaceHandler
Handler that returns a PNG snapshot of a workspace.
SimpleWebServerBrew
Manages a simple web server via EventBus requests.
StartServerRequest
Starts the embedded web server for the paint app.
StopServerRequest
Stops the embedded web server.
SubscribeEvent
Marks a method as an event handler for a specific event type.
SubWindowBrew
Manages all auxiliary subwindows (History, Layers, Tools, Settings, About, Help, Changelog).
SubwindowUtil
Utility class for creating and positioning subwindows (secondary Stage instances) relative to a main JavaFX application window.
TextTool
A tool for creating text on the canvas.
ToggleAutosaveRequest
Toggles the autosave feature on or off.
Tool
Abstract base class for all paint tools.
ToolChangedEvent
Event indicating the active tool has changed.
ToolInfoController
Controller for the tool information panel.
ToolsController
JavaFX controller for the tool palette in the main workspace.
TransformWorkspaceRequest
Requests a whole workspace transformation.
UndoRedoCapability
Manages undo/redo functionality for a workspace.
UndoRequest
Requests to undo the last action.
WidthCapability
Marker interface indicating that a tool supports adjustable stroke width.
WidthChangedEvent
Event indicating the global stroke width has changed.
Workspace
Represents a single paint workspace.
WorkspaceBrew
Manages the lifecycle and state of all Workspace instances.
WorkspaceController
Controller for the main workspace area of the application.
WorkspaceSaveAsRequest
Event signaling that the current workspace should be saved under a file name specified by the user.
WorkspaceSavedAsEvent
Event fired when a workspace is saved under a new name or location.
WorkspaceSavedEvent
Event fired when a workspace is successfully saved.
WorkspaceSaveRequest
Event signaling that the current workspace should be saved to its associated file location.
WorkspaceSaveWarningPopup
Popup warning the user about unsaved changes in a single workspace.
ZoomCapability
Provides zooming functionality for a workspace.
